definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: If I have enought money, I will make a journey around the world.
sentences.chinese: 如果我有足夠的資金，我將完成一次環球旅行。

sentences.english: The next decade she killed in two round-the-world journeys.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的10年她作了兩次環球旅行。

sentences.english: He wishes to make a round- the -world tour.
sentences.chinese: 他希望能有一次環球旅行。

sentences.english: I'm quite sure that Uncle Li will make a round-the-world tour soon.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定李叔叔很快就要做一次環球旅行了。

sentences.english: Ma Zhongxin is a world famous global traveler.
sentences.chinese: 馬中欣是國際著名的環球旅行家。

sentences.english: There are millions of jobs available in the global economy that demand travel.
sentences.chinese: 有數以百萬的工作需要環球旅行。

sentences.english: She planned to travel round the world.
This was also the first successful attempt to circumnavigate the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 這也是第一次嘗試成功的環球旅行。

sentences.english: Many difficulties and dangers attended upon his single-handed voyage round the world.
sentences.chinese: 他單獨作環球旅行，遇到了許多艱難險阻。

sentences.english: He made a journey by bicycle round the world.
The globe-trotting dunce is more stupid than the dunce who stays at home.
sentences.chinese: 環球旅行的笨人比呆在家裏的笨人還要愚蠢。

definition: (of a student) to work part-time (while continuing one's studies)/(of a delinquent) to be reformed through work and study
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
student who also works part-time/(old) reform-school student
